title: Cebuano (1904) Luke
description: Cebuano translation of the Gospel of Luke published in 1904 by the British and Foreign Bible Society. Cebuano, also referred to by most of its speakers simply and generically as Binisaya, is an Austronesian language, spoken in the southern Philippines.

language.name: Cebuano
language.area: Negros, Cebu, Bohol, Visayas and parts of Mindanao. Also in United States.
